name: Gutenberg Themes – Ultimate Solution for Block Templates
author: frontrom

sections.description:
FrontRom, an ideal Gutenberg block integral theme editor plugin for WordPress, enables the opportunity to design smartly the layout of your web templates.

This plugin is perfect for designing business, commercial service, and blogging websites, and it provides the users with the liberty to create, compose, and format the contents without any coding. That means, editing your website templates according to your need and wish takes only a moment now with the FrontRom plugin.

User-friendly, easily installable FrontRom comes up with all the technical support and functions that you require to use Gutenberg compatible theme, and more importantly, designing the themes becomes more handy and comfortable with this plugin. As they are easily editable by the Gutenberg theme customizer, the themes can be customized with various features that improve the quality of the website and enhance its efficacy.

In a nutshell, FrontRom plugin allows all the editing processes such as altering the image, modifying the font size or font style, and changing the background of the template being performed by the Gutenberg editor easily and quickly that leads to the creation of a productive, eye-catching and outstanding website.

So, if you are looking for a smooth page builder or template customizer and lively experience of working with WordPress, FrontRom should be your best choice.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Is FrontRom free?

Yes! FrontRom is 100% free and always will be.

Is it fully compatible with Gutenberg

Yes! FrontRom is 100% compatible with Gutenberg.

Is there any predefine theme

Yes! its contain predefine theme with home, about contact and blog page.

  • Fix Missing permission callback method.

  • New Set permission for rest route.

  • New Set bootstrap grid system.

= 0.3-b.2 – Sep 17, 2020=

  • New Customize text style with font size, google font family, weight, background, color, text shadow, margin, padding, border etc.

= 0.3-b.1 – Sep 12, 2020=

  • New Introduce with Gutenberg theme

0.2

  • New Make compatible with WP 5.4

0.1

  • New Initial version released
